Plot: Yearning for escape and adventure, a young boy runs away from home and sails to an island filled with creatures that take him in as their king.
Title: Where the Wild Things Are
Writer: Spike Jonze (screenplay), Dave Eggers (screenplay), Maurice Sendak (book)
Actors: Max Records, Pepita Emmerichs, Max Pfeifer, Madeleine Greaves
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 7 wins & 44 nominations.
